Description.Text: Located 500 metres from the charming Copacabana Beach, and 350 metres from Siqueira Campos metro station, Hotel Atlântico Travel offers accommodation in Rio de Janeiro. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Every room in this 4-stars hotel is decorated in contemporary style and is fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Guests will also find a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. In a pleasant area decorated with classic paintings, guests enjoy buffet breakfast with a variety of tropical fruits, juices, breads and cakes. À la carte Brazilian dishes are served for lunch and dinner. The famous Ipanema Beach is 3 km from Hotel Atlântico Travel Copacabana, while Santos Dumont Airport is 6 km away. Galeão International Airport is 25.5 km from the property.
